dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: A terrible jest Jia Yuanchun plays, down to the very last day.
Too much time has passed already...

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: I have already given her clan, including Wei, instructions to keep their eyes on the Palanquin, as I observed much strangeness from the Palanquin bearers...

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: ... yet there are many places to which one may covertly kidnap the Family Hierarch.
Still, we have to—!

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: Your heart is still in a rush. I do not mean to imply that we will abandon her to fate.

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: Look, I have selected a few places on the map with the highest probabilities of being their destination.

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: As the time is not on our side, the Heishou Packs and your team will have to mobilize separately to explore all possible options.

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: Among them I aim to send you toward...
... This place.

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: Indeed. The glorified internment camp of Hongyuan, now shut down.

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: <ruby=Peace and Calm>Pingan</ruby> Residential Support Zone. It is a policy Jia Yuanchun and the former Jia Mu pursued.

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: The policy was indefinitely tabled and the zone was closed off, as many voiced reluctance to pass it, but I find it hard to believe that Jia Yuanchun would admit defeat so easily.

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: It is a secluded place, perfect to secretly bring harm to the Family Hierarch... not to mention the symbolic value it carries.
I hope she's okay...

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: Have some faith in your pupil.

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: You have taught her to the best of your abilities, have you not? I trust that she will be able to fend for herself until our arrival.
... Yeah. We trained really, really hard for the entire month.

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: The only reason Jia Yuanchun would employ such under-the-table tactics is because she knows that a fair match would not be in her favor.

dataList.title: The Pinky
dataList.content: So, let us yank her hand out from under the table and make her regret it.
